data.lyric:
[ti:Starting Over]
[ar:Chris Stapleton]
[al:Starting Over]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Starting Over - Chris Stapleton
[00:07.30]Lyrics by：Chris Stapleton/Mike Henderson
[00:14.60]Composed by：Chris Stapleton/Mike Henderson
[00:21.91]Well the road rolls out like a welcome mat
[00:27.34]To a better place than the one we're at
[00:32.90]And I ain't got no kinda plan
[00:37.80]But I've had all of this town I can stand
[00:43.70]And I got friends out on the coast
[00:48.88]We can jump in the water and see what floats
[00:54.83]We've been saving for a rainy day
[00:59.63]Let's beat the storm and be on our way
[01:05.32]And it don't matter to me
[01:07.13]Wherever we are is where I wanna be
[01:10.35]And Honey for once in our life
[01:12.59]Let's take our chances and roll the dice
[01:16.24]I can be your lucky penny you can be my four-leaf clover
[01:23.62]Starting over
[01:34.65]This might not be an easy time
[01:39.92]There's rivers to cross and hills to climb
[01:45.70]Some days we might fall apart
[01:50.61]And some nights might feel cold and dark
[01:56.15]But nobody wins afraid of losing
[02:01.27]And the hard roads are the ones worth choosing
[02:07.31]Some days we'll look back and smile
[02:12.25]And know it was worth every mile
[02:18.06]And it don't matter to me
[02:19.74]Wherever we are is where I wanna be
[02:23.00]And Honey for once in our life
[02:25.09]Let's take our chances and roll the dice
[02:28.87]I can be your lucky penny you can be my four-leaf clover
[02:36.16]Starting over
[02:41.67]Starting over
[03:01.08]It don't matter to me
[03:02.79]Wherever we are is where I wanna be
[03:06.09]And Honey for once in our life
[03:08.32]Let's take our chances and roll the dice
[03:11.77]I can be your lucky penny you can be my four-leaf clover
[03:19.15]Starting over
[03:24.63]Starting over
[03:30.70]Oooh ooh-ooh-ooh
[03:41.33]Oooh ooh-ooh-ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Starting Over]
[ar:Chris Stapleton]
[al:Starting Over]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.30]//
[00:14.60]//
[00:21.91]道路不断延伸 就像迎宾垫
[00:27.34]通往比这里更好的地方
[00:32.90]我没有计划
[00:37.80]但我可以在这座小城里停留
[00:43.70]我在海边有很多朋友
[00:48.88]我们可以跳进水中 看看水中的鱼儿
[00:54.83]我们在存钱 以备不时之需
[00:59.63]让我们迎风而上 踏上旅途吧
[01:05.32]我觉得无所谓
[01:07.13]不管在哪里 我都觉得很满意
[01:10.35]亲爱的 这辈子仅此一次
[01:12.59]让我们不顾一切 冒险一次
[01:16.24]我可以做你的幸运星 你可以做我的四叶草
[01:23.62]重新开始
[01:34.65]这可能不会很容易
[01:39.92]我们要跋山涉水才可以
[01:45.70]有时候我们甚至会感觉崩溃
[01:50.61]有些夜晚可能会寒冷又孤寂
[01:56.15]但是害怕失败就没人能胜利
[02:01.27]虽然路途崎岖 但值得冒险一次
[02:07.31]总有一天 我们回首过去 微微一笑
[02:12.25]会发现每一刻都是值得的
[02:18.06]我觉得无所谓
[02:19.74]不管在哪里 我都觉得很满意
[02:23.00]亲爱的 这辈子仅此一次
[02:25.09]让我们不顾一切 冒险一次
[02:28.87]我可以做你的幸运星 你可以做我的四叶草
[02:36.16]重新开始
[02:41.67]重新开始
[03:01.08]我觉得无所谓
[03:02.79]不管在哪里 我都觉得很满意
[03:06.09]亲爱的 这辈子仅此一次
[03:08.32]让我们不顾一切 冒险一次
[03:11.77]我可以做你的幸运星 你可以做我的四叶草
[03:19.15]重新开始
[03:24.63]重新开始
[03:30.70]//
[03:41.33]//
